definition: tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Rather the sun once connects the agreeable son carries of tea ugg tall drinks, superficial drank one one morsel.
sentences.chinese: 寧陽接過良兒端來的茶水，淺淺喝了一口。

sentences.english: The tea, though freshly brewed, still tastes thick and stale.
sentences.chinese: 新沏的茶水喝起來卻仍舊厚重滯澀。

sentences.english: Joyce's day-off tips have gone straight to the local food pantry.
sentences.chinese: 喬伊斯的一天小康提醒曾經持續向本地糧食茶水。

sentences.english: No problem. No task is too small for the Waterboy.
sentences.chinese: 沒問題，對茶水小子來說沒有什麼是小事。

sentences.english: While the master quietly served tea, the professor talked about Zen.
sentences.chinese: 當禪師安靜地準備茶水時，學者滔滔不絕地談着禪。

sentences.english: Tea that contains tanin can be used to tighten the membranes in the throat as well reduce itch when consumed as well.
sentences.chinese: 含有塔寧的茶水也可用於收緊喉嚨膜，減輕喉嚨癢痛。

sentences.english: After the lecture, tea was served and people began to talk to one another.
sentences.chinese: 演講過後，茶水送上來了，大家便開始互相交談。

sentences.english: In the experiments of influence of temperature and ratio of tea to water, their dissolving characteristic showed similarity to some degree.
sentences.chinese: 在溫度和茶水比實驗中，二者的溶出有一定的相似性。

sentences.english: Ginger is at the door with the tea, I do not know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 金姐在門口端着茶水，不知如何是好。

sentences.english: The waiter soon brought him a cup of tea.
sentences.chinese: 這位服務員馬上就給他端來了上杯茶水。

sentences.english: Opposite the galley there is no dinette, but a head and a pantry.
sentences.chinese: 對面的廚房是沒有餐桌椅，但頭部和茶水。

sentences.english: Apart from the Queen, GaGa is the most famous tea drinker in the world. And I couldn't resist mocking her up as a traditional tea lady.
sentences.chinese: 除了女王，gaga是這個世界上最著名的茶水飲者。

sentences.english: This isn’t the same honey you put in your tea.
sentences.chinese: 這和你衝進茶水中的蜂蜜並不相同。

sentences.english: She poured more tea into her cup, watching its flow sideways.
sentences.chinese: 她又添茶，並斜眼望着茶水從壺嘴往杯子裏淌。

sentences.english: A bowl of water to take firm, can not be arbitrarily dumping food and tea.
sentences.chinese: 端碗端水要拿穩，不可隨意傾倒飯菜和茶水。

sentences.english: Blend diced peaches and sugar in a blender until smooth; mix into tea.
sentences.chinese: 將水蜜桃塊和糖放入攪拌機絞碎，加入茶水。

definition: (fig.) to have a meeting with state security agents (to be warned to behave "responsibly")
tea and cake/refreshments/tea and dimsun 點心|点心, traditional Hong Kong lunch
